title: Governance Level Approval
content:
This is an approval feature that allows you to create a high level approval.

For example, you might set up Governance Level Approval that requires approval for a request where the cost exceeds a specified amount.

Governance level approval is enabled for the following record types:

  • Agreement

  • Article

  • Change

  • Idea

  • Proposal

  • Release

  • Request

    This feature applies to the service and cart request record types, but not to the support request record type. The approval plan runs only once in cases where there are child requests. It doesn't operate on the child requests.

Related topics

  • How does Governance Level Approval Work?
  • How to set up Governance Level Approval
